Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

ActionParams.description: The set of parameters for this mitigation action. You can specify only one type of parameter (in other words, you can apply only one action for each defined mitigation action).

AddThingsToThingGroupParams.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that moves devices associated with a certificate to one or more specified thing groups, typically for quarantine.

properties.name: OverrideDynamicGroups
properties.description: Specifies if this mitigation action can move the things that triggered the mitigation action out of one or more dynamic thing groups.

type.description: Specifies if this mitigation action can move the things that triggered the mitigation action out of one or more dynamic thing groups.

properties.name: ThingGroupNames
properties.description: The list of groups to which you want to add the things that triggered the mitigation action.

type.description: The list of groups to which you want to add the things that triggered the mitigation action.

EnableIoTLoggingParams.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that enables AWS IoT logging at a specified level of detail.

properties.name: LogLevel
properties.description: Specifies which types of information are logged.

type.description: Specifies which types of information are logged.

properties.name: RoleArnForLogging
properties.description: The ARN of the IAM role used for logging.

type.description: The ARN of the IAM role used for logging.

PublishFindingToSnsParams.description: Parameters, to define a mitigation action that publishes findings to Amazon SNS. You can implement your own custom actions in response to the Amazon SNS messages.

properties.name: TopicArn
properties.description: The ARN of the topic to which you want to publish the findings.

type.description: The ARN of the topic to which you want to publish the findings.

ReplaceDefaultPolicyVersionParams.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that adds a blank policy to restrict permissions.

UpdateCACertificateParams.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that changes the state of the CA certificate to inactive.

UpdateDeviceCertificateParams.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that changes the state of the device certificate to inactive.

resource.description: Mitigation actions can be used to take actions to mitigate issues that were found in an Audit finding or Detect violation.

properties.name: ActionName
properties.description: A unique identifier for the mitigation action.

type.description: A unique identifier for the mitigation action.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

attributes.description: Mitigation actions can be used to take actions to mitigate issues that were found in an Audit finding or Detect violation.
